original_title: Majlis al Jinn (Meeting Place of the Jinn)
overview: In this video I wanted to mix Ballardian landscapes with elements of Islamic mythology to arrive at something new and unfamiliar. This is the reality of this part of the middle east: 21st century technologies combined with religious beliefs forged in the 7th century.
title: Majlis al Jinn (Meeting Place of the Jinn)
